Header: New MGO Major General Prasanna Chandrasekara Assumes Office at AHQ
Content: Major General Prasanna Chandrasekara of the Sri Lanka Signal Corps (SLSC) took over duties as the new Master General Ordnance (MGO) at the Army Headquarters, Sri Jayewardenepura this morning (9) during a brief ceremony at his office. He succeeded Major General H.R.K.P Peiris who has now been appointed as the new Chief Field Engineer. The new MGO signed a formal document and marked the assumption of his duties after following Buddhist observances. Major General Prasanna Chandrasekara, prior to this new appointment served as the Director General of Army Real Estate and Quartering.
